info.title: Raider.IO Developer API
info.description: Raider.IO provides detailed character and guild rankings for Raiding and Mythic+ content.

get.summary: Retrieve the current, previous, and next period ids and date ranges

parameters.description: Name of realm that character is on. This can be in slug or title format, e.g. "Altar of Storms" or "altar-of-storms"
parameters.name: realm

parameters.description: Name of the character to look up. This is not case sensitive.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description:
List of fields to retrieve for this character.

General fields:
- gear
- talents
- talents:categorized
- guild
- covenant

Raiding fields:
- raid_progression

Mythic Plus fields:
- mythic_plus_scores_by_season
- mythic_plus_ranks
- mythic_plus_recent_runs
- mythic_plus_best_runs
- mythic_plus_alternate_runs
- mythic_plus_highest_level_runs
- mythic_plus_weekly_highest_level_runs
- mythic_plus_previous_weekly_highest_level_runs
- previous_mythic_plus_ranks

Other fields:
- raid_achievement_meta
- raid_achievement_curve
parameters.name: fields

get.summary: Retrieve information about a guild boss kill.

parameters.description: Name of realm that guild is on. This can be in slug or title format, e.g. "Altar of Storms" or "altar-of-storms"
parameters.name: realm

parameters.description: Name of the guild to look up. This is not case sensitive.
parameters.name: guild

parameters.description: Raid slug to look up
parameters.name: raid

parameters.description: Boss slug to look up
parameters.name: boss

parameters.description: Raid difficulty to look up
parameters.name: difficulty

parameters.description: Name of realm that guild is on. This can be in slug or title format, e.g. "Altar of Storms" or "altar-of-storms"
parameters.name: realm

parameters.description: Name of the guild to look up. This is not case sensitive.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description:
List of fields to retrieve for this guild.

Supported values:
- raid_progression
- raid_encounters:RAID_SLUG:DIFFICULTY
- raid_rankings
- members
parameters.name: fields

get.summary: Retrieve the affixes for a specific region, including the latest run seen with this affix

parameters.description: Language to return name and description of affixes in.
parameters.name: locale

get.summary: Retrieve the leaderboard capacity for a region including lowest level and time to qualify

parameters.description: Retrieve the capacity info for the current or previous week.
parameters.name: scope

get.summary: Retrieve details for a specific Mythic+ run

parameters.description: Name of the season to retrieve (season-df-1, etc.). Defaults to current season.
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: ID of the run that you want to get details for
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve information about the top runs that match the given criteria

parameters.description: Name of season to request data for
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Name of dungeon to filter by. This can be the dungeon's full name "Eye of Azshara" or its slug "eye-of-azshara". Use special keyword "all" to get the stats across all dungeons.
parameters.name: dungeon

parameters.description: Name of the affixes to restrict the results to. This will support affix in slug form: "bolstering-explosive-tyrannical". Additionally, you can supply just "tyrannical" or "fortified" to get the results for any affix combo with that as the final affix. Use the special keyword "current" to return the result for the current week's affixes, or "all" to retrieve results for all affixes.
parameters.name: affixes

get.summary: Retrieve the colors used for score tiers in the given season.

parameters.description: Name of the season to retrieve (season-bfa-1, etc.). Defaults to current season.
parameters.name: season

get.summary: Retrieve the Mythic+ Season cutoffs for a region

parameters.description: Season to retrieve cutoffs for
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Region to receive cutoffs for
parameters.name: region

get.summary: Retrieve mythic plus season and dungeon static data for a specific expansion (slugs, names, etc.)

parameters.description: Expansion ID to get slugs for. 9 = Dragonflight, 8 = Shadowlands, 7 = Battle for Azeroth, 6 = Legion
parameters.name: expansion_id

get.summary: Retrieve the boss rankings for a given raid and region

parameters.description: Raid to look up. This can be the raid's full name ("Tomb of Sargeras") or its name in slug form: "tomb-of-sargeras"
parameters.name: raid

parameters.description: Slug of boss to look up
parameters.name: boss

parameters.description: Name of region to restrict progress to. Can be a primary region: world, us, eu, kr, tw. Or a subregion: english, french, german, italian, oceanic, russian, spanish, eu-english, eu-portuguese, eu-spanish, us-english, brazil, us-spanish, us-central, us-eastern, us-mountain, us-pacific
parameters.name: region

parameters.description: Name of realm to restrict to. Prefix with `connected-` to retrieve rankings from the connected realm. Requires that region be a standard region: us, eu, kr, tw.
parameters.name: realm

get.summary: Retrieve the hall of fame for a given raid

parameters.description: Raid to look up. This can be the raid's full name ("Tomb of Sargeras") or its name in slug form: "tomb-of-sargeras"
parameters.name: raid

get.summary: Retrieve details of raiding progression for a raid

parameters.description: Raid to look up. This can be the raid's full name ("Tomb of Sargeras") or its name in slug form: "tomb-of-sargeras"
parameters.name: raid

get.summary: Retrieve the raid rankings for a given raid and region

parameters.description: Raid to look up. This can be the raid's full name ("Tomb of Sargeras") or its name in slug form: "tomb-of-sargeras"
parameters.name: raid

parameters.description: Name of region to restrict progress to. Can be a primary region: world, us, eu, kr, tw. Or a subregion: english, french, german, italian, oceanic, russian, spanish, eu-english, eu-portuguese, eu-spanish, us-english, brazil, us-spanish, us-central, us-eastern, us-mountain, us-pacific
parameters.name: region

parameters.description: Name of realm to restrict to. Prefix with `connected-` to retrieve rankings from the connected realm. Requires that region be a standard region: us, eu, kr, tw.
parameters.name: realm

parameters.description: Guild IDs of guilds to restrict the results to. Allows filtering to up to 10 different guilds.
parameters.name: guilds

get.summary: Retrieve raid and boss static data for a specific expansion (slugs, names, etc.)

parameters.description: Expansion ID to get slugs for. 9 = Dragonflight, 8 = Shadowlands, 7 = Battle for Azeroth, 6 = Legion
parameters.name: expansion_id

artifact_traits.description: Character's artifact traits on equipped artifact weapon

normal_bosses_killed.description: Number of normal mode bosses killed

heroic_bosses_killed.description: Number of heroic mode bosses killed

mythic_bosses_killed.description: Number of mythic mode bosses killed

tank.description: Rank across tanks from any classes

healer.description: Rank across healers from any classes

dps.description: Rank across DPS from any classes

class.description: Rank across all roles from player's class

class_tank.description: Rank across tanks from player's class

class_healer.description: Rank across healers from player's class

class_dps.description: Rank across DPS from player's class

mythic_plus_ranks.description: Character's current season Mythic+ Ranks across all leaderboards and roles

mythic_plus_scores.description: Character's current season Mythic+ Scores across all roles

all.description: Player's best score across all possible roles

previous_mythic_plus_ranks.description: Character's previous season Mythic+ Ranks across all leaderboards and roles

previous_mythic_plus_scores.description: Character's previous season Mythic+ Scores across all roles

all.description: Player's best score across all possible roles

short_name.description: Shortened or abbreviated name of Dungeon

clear_time_ms.description: How long it took to complete the dungeon, in milliseconds

num_keystone_upgrades.description: How many times the keystone used for this dungeon would have been upgraded after completion

score.description: How many points this run was worth

url.description: URL to this specific run to view roster details

mythic_plus_recent_runs.description: Character's most recent Mythic+ runs from current season

mythic_plus_best_runs.description: Character's highest scoring Mythic+ runs from current season

mythic_plus_alternate_runs.description: Character's alternate highest scoring Mythic+ runs from current season

active_spec_role.description: Name of the role for character's active spec

profile_url.description: URL for Character's profile on Raider.IO
URL for Guild's profile on Raider.IO

description.description: Description of the effects of this affix
description.example: When any non-boss enemy dies, its death cry empowers nearby allies, increasing their maximum health and damage by 20%.

wowhead_url.description: URL to open details on this affix on Wowhead

affix_details.description: List of details for each active affix

title.description: Human readable title for the current affixes

slug.description: Slug for the realm, suitable for putting in URLs

isConnected.description: Whether the realm is part of a connected realm

slug.description: Slug for the region, suitable for putting in URLs

id.description: Internal Raider.IO ID number for this guild

progress.description: How many bosses out of all bosses in this instance

totalGuilds.description: The number of guilds that are at this point of progression
